price: 至于不归信而且否认我的迹象，以及后世的相会者，将被拘禁在刑罚中。
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَلِقَآيِٕ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā waliqāi al-ākhirati fa-ulāika fī al-ʿadhābi muḥ'ḍarūna
